post.text: Tim Kaine and Hillary Clinton have some things in common! Just like Clinton, Kaine also has a pay-to-play problem! Like I said, CORRUPTION!

comment.author: Jessica
comment.text: Trump and Pence have a sick love affair with Putin in common... is there a threesome in the near future?

replies.author: Kiernan Sean
replies.text: YOU Jessica have a strange love affair with eating filthy and full colostomy bags .
